trans-unit.source: Show convenient version of this site
Path to configuration file: Redirect configuration file path (e.g. EXT:template/Configuration/Redirect/Redirect.php)

Add names for own IpToCountry Serviceclasses (commaseparated) (e.g. In2code\Ipandlanguageredirect\Domain\Service\IpToCountry\IpApi). All classes will be called as long as a countrycode could be determinded.
